requirements.summary: Create responsive site layout with persistent header navigation (desktop + mobile) and footer, and implement all required public pages (Home, About, Admissions, Academics/Programs, Campus Life, News & Events, Contact).
acceptanceCriteria: A visitor can navigate to each of the listed pages from a persistent header navigation on desktop and a mobile menu on small screens.
Each page has a clear page title/hero area and readable layout on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
A footer is present on all pages and includes at minimum: address placeholder, contact email/phone placeholders, and quick links to key pages.

file_operations.description: Create the app shell with routing for all required public pages and a shared layout wrapper (header + footer) so navigation is persistent. Use shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., navigation buttons/links and mobile menu container such as Sheet) to ensure accessible responsive navigation; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a shared layout component that renders the Header, main content container, and Footer consistently across all routes; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement a responsive header with desktop top-nav and a small-screen mobile menu. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Sheet/Drawer) to support accessible toggles and focus handling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement a footer shown on all pages with address/contact placeholders and quick links to key pages; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create About page with page title/hero and classic collegiate content sections using readable responsive layout; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create Admissions page with page title/hero and admissions overview + steps/requirements placeholders; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create Academics page with page title/hero and a Programs/Departments listing section rendered as responsive cards/list; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create Campus Life page with page title/hero and student life sections (housing, clubs, athletics, support) with placeholders; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create News & Events page route shell with hero/title and sections for News and Upcoming Events lists (data wired in REQ-5); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create Contact page route shell with hero/title and space for the contact form + contact details (form wired in REQ-3); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement Home page content blocks: hero banner with primary CTA, key stats/highlights, featured programs teaser, upcoming events teaser, latest news teaser, and campus life teaser with links to News & Events.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes the specified content blocks with sensible placeholder text in English.
Primary CTA button is visible above the fold on desktop and near the top on mobile.
Events and news teasers link to the full News & Events page/sections.

file_operations.description: Implement the Home page layout with hero (primary CTA), stats/highlights, and teaser sections for programs, events, news, and campus life. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button, Card, Badge) for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a responsive stats/highlights block (3–6 items) with placeholder copy; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add reusable teaser blocks for programs, events, news, and campus life with clear calls-to-action linking to the News & Events page sections; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the HomePage route as the default route and ensure teaser links navigate to the News & Events route (and in-page anchors if used); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add Contact page form (name, email, subject, message) that validates in UI, submits to backend, and shows success/error states plus static contact details and office hours.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form validates required fields in the UI before submission.
On successful submission, the user sees a confirmation message and the form resets.
On failure, the user sees a non-technical error message and can retry.

file_operations.description: Create a Contact form component with client-side required-field validation (name/email/subject/message), submit loading state, success confirmation, and non-technical error state with retry. Use shadcn-ui form inputs (e.g., Input, Textarea, Button, Alert) for consistent UI; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Render the ContactForm component and add static contact details + office hours placeholders in English alongside the form in a responsive layout; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a small hook that uses useActor() to call the backend submitInquiry capability and exposes submit/loading/error/success helpers for the Contact form UI. Keep error messages user-friendly; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build News & Events page with seed data lists for news and events (dates, titles, summaries; events include date/time and location placeholder) in a clean responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: News list renders at least 3 seed news items with title, date, and summary.
Events list renders at least 3 seed events with title, date/time, and location placeholder.
Items are displayed in a clean, scannable layout and are responsive.

file_operations.description: Add English seed data for at least 3 news items and at least 3 upcoming events, including title/date/summary and event location placeholders.

Render the seed news and events as two scannable responsive lists/sections. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Separator, Badge) for consistent styling and readability; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Populate the Home page 'Latest news' and 'Upcoming events' teasers using the same seed data source and link through to the full News & Events page; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent classic collegiate visual theme (deep maroon + warm cream, serif headings, consistent spacing/components) across all pages using Tailwind.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent typography scale, button styles, and section spacing.
Theme colors are applied consistently (header, links, CTAs, accents) and maintain accessible contrast for body text.
The UI uses Tailwind styling consistently; no unstyled placeholder pages remain.

file_operations.description: Define Tailwind base/components/utilities plus global theme tokens (CSS variables) for a classic collegiate palette (deep maroon + warm cream), typographic defaults (serif headings), and consistent section spacing utilities.
Extend Tailwind theme for collegiate typography (serif heading font family) and any additional named color tokens/aliases needed to apply the theme consistently across components and pages.

Apply consistent container widths, section spacing, and typographic hierarchy defaults at the layout level so all pages inherit a coherent theme; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply theme styling for header background/links/active state and CTA styling consistent with the collegiate palette; use shadcn-ui components where appropriate; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Apply theme styling for footer background/typography/link styling consistent with the collegiate palette; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in header/footer (crest/logo) and Home hero (hero image).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated image files exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated` with the specified filenames.
Header/footer render the generated crest/logo asset.
Home hero renders the generated hero image and scales appropriately on different screen sizes.

file_operations.description: Add the generated crest/logo image asset at this exact path and filename so it can be referenced as a static public asset.
Add the generated campus hero banner image asset at this exact path and filename so it can be referenced as a static public asset.

Render the crest/logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/college-crest-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header and ensure it scales well on mobile/desktop; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Render the crest/logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/college-crest-logo.dim_512x512.png in the footer; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Use the hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/campus-hero.dim_1600x600.png in the Home hero banner and ensure responsive scaling/cropping across breakpoints; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
